text: Ara smarana karo! Ibrahimake tamra prabhu kayekati nirdesa dbara pariksa karalena, ara tini segulo sampadana karalena. Tini balalena -- “ami niscaya'i tomake manabajatira jan'ya imama karate yacchi.” Tini balalena -- “ara amara bansadharagana theke?” Tini balalena -- “amara angikara an'yayakaridera upare bartaya na.”
